title: handSample
description: Per-frame pose sample for a tracked hand. Each sample references static hand metadata and contains both joint and bone samples.

metadataRef.description: Reference to the static metadata entry describing this hand (hand.meta.json).

timestamp.description: Timestamp for this sample, defined using MIND's temporal format.

jointSamples.description: Array of per-joint samples captured for this frame, defined using joint sample schema.

boneSamples.description: Optional array of per-bone samples captured for this frame, defined using bone sample schema.

trackingConfidence.description: Optional overall confidence level for the hand tracking system at this frame.

state.description: Optional high-level state label for the hand (e.g., 'open', 'closed', 'pinch', 'point').
